intro: Cudrania, commonly known as the desert hibiscus, is a genus of flowering plants in the Malvaceae family. Cudrania species are adapted to survive in harsh environments, with some possessing succulent leaves and deep root systems to conserve water. They play an important role in their ecosystems by providing food and habitat for various animals.
